content.content: 1. Northeast Power Coordinating Council, Inc. is designated as a standards authority for the purposes of the definition of “standards authority” in subsection 2 (1) of the Act.  O. Reg. 214/08, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Northeast Power Coordinating Council, Inc. is designated as a standards authority for the purposes of the definition of “standards authority” in subsection 2 (1) of the Act.  O. Reg. 214/08, s. 1.

content.content: 2. For the purposes of subsection 36.2 (4) of the Act, the prescribed period is 120 days.  O. Reg. 214/08, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. For the purposes of subsection 36.2 (4) of the Act, the prescribed period is 120 days.  O. Reg. 214/08, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 214/08, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 214/08, s. 3.
